#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=DS : What keeps people from knowing the difference between what is real and important , and what is not ?
#Text=RP : Our belief systems .
#Text=If you are a Christian then your belief system does n’t allow for transgender or any of those things , and you then are going to have a vested interest in not understanding that .
#Text=Why ?
#Text=Because if one peg in your belief system does n’t work or does n’t fit , the whole thing will crumble .
#Text=So some people wo n’t understand the difference between a transvestite and transsexual .
#Text=They will not understand that no matter how hard you force them to because it will mean deconstructing their whole belief system .
#Text=If they understand Adam and Eve is a parable or fairytale , they then have to rethink their entire belief system .
#Text=As to me being seen as whatever , I was more likely commenting on the phenomenon of our culture .
#Text=I am creative , and I am all of those things you mention , and doing one thing out there and people seeing it , it does n’t matter if people know all that about me or not .
#Text=DS : Recently I interviewed Natasha Khan of the band Bat for Lashes , and she is considered by many to be one of the real up-and-coming artists in music today .
#Text=Her band was up for the Mercury Prize in England .

#Text=When I asked her where she drew inspiration from , she mentioned what really got her recently was the 1960 ’s and 70 's psychedelic drag queen performance art , such as seen in Jack Smith and the Destruction of Atlantis , The Cockettes and Paris Is Burning .
#Text=What do you think when you hear an artist in her twenties looking to that era of drag performance art for inspiration ?
#Text=RP :
#Text=The first thing I think of when I hear that is that young kids are always looking for the ‘ rock and roll ’ answer to give .
#Text=It ’s very clever to give that answer .
#Text=She ’s asked that a lot :
#Text=" Where do you get your inspiration ?

#Text= And what she gave you is the best sound bite she could ; it ’s a really a good sound bite .
